Class SorterFactory

java.lang.Object
readandsort.util.SorterFactory
public class SorterFactory extends Object
The SorterFactory class generates CollectionSorter instances based on the provided sorter type.

This class is a utility class that simplifies object creation logic for the CollectionSorter interface. It supports flexibility for different sorting logics. If the sorter type is unrecognized, it returns the fallback LinkedListSorter and displays the warnings.
Additionally, all returned sorters must be the concrete classes of the CollectionSorter interface.

Version update:
This SorterFactory was added a StackSorter to create a stack-based sorter.

Since:
Week 4 of CSC6301
Version:
1.1.0
Author:
Huihua Huang

  • Method Details

    • createSorter

      public static CollectionSorter createSorter(String sorterType)
      Creates and returns an instance of a class that implements the interface CollectionSorter based on given sorter type.

      It greatly supports sorter type extensions, returns a default LinkedListSorter if invalid sorter type is detected.

      Parameters:
      sorterType - the name of the specific sorter (e.g., "LinkedList")
      Returns:
      a CollectionSorter instance or a LinkedListSorter instance if the sorter type is invalid.
